findings.details: Blog pagination links contain a malformed aria-label attribute (missing closing quote), which can break HTML parsing and assistive tech labels.
External news links present; not revalidated in this run due to restricted network access.
Site-wide SEO tags, keywords, theme-color, and structured data are present in the default layout.
Recent daily news posts are present; no content edits made in this run.

recommendations: Keep pagination markup valid to preserve screen reader labels
Spot-check a sample of external news links when network access is available
